headline: O’Reilly Stock Split Drives Price Target Adjustment Despite Mixed Q1 Results
summary: O’Reilly Automotive Inc. (NASDAQ:ORLY) is one of the best consumer cyclical stocks to buy. On June 18, DA Davidson maintained its Buy rating on O’Reilly Automotive (NASDAQ:ORLY) while reducing its price target to $107 on the company’s shares. The firm claims that O’Reilly’s 15-to-1 stock split, which went into effect on June 10, is reflected […]
